1338.name: Forceful Greatsword
1338.description: Gain might on a critical hit with a greatsword or spear. Greatsword and spear skills deal more damage and recharge faster.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

1437.name: Berserker's Power
1437.description: Gain increased damage when you use a <c=@abilitytype>burst</c> skill; this damage increase is based on your adrenaline.

facts.description: 7% damage per stack.
7% damage per stack.
7% damage per stack.

1440.name: Merciless Hammer
1440.description:
Deal increased damage with a hammer when striking a foe that is dazed, knocked downed, launched, or stunned. Hammer skills gain reduced recharge. Inflict confusion when you interrupt enemy skills.
This trait can only confuse enemies with defiance bars once per interval.

facts.description: Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.
Damage received on skill activation; stacks intensity.

1444.name: Peak Performance
1444.description: <c=@abilitytype>Physical</c> skills have reduced recharge and increase all outgoing physical damage for a period of time. Receive less damage from falling, and launch nearby foes when you take fall damage.

facts.description: Outgoing physical damage is increased.
Outgoing physical damage is increased.

skills.name: Death from Above
skills.description: Launch nearby foes into the air with a powerful stomp.

1446.name: Reckless Dodge
1446.description: Damage foes at the end of a dodge roll.

skills.name: Reckless Impact

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

skills.description: Damage foes at the end of your dodge roll. Gain might for each foe struck by this attack.

1447.name: Brave Stride
1447.description: Your first strike when entering combat grants stability.

facts.description: Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.

1449.name: Great Fortitude
1449.description: Gain vitality based on a percentage of your power.

1451.name: Restorative Strength
1451.description: Using a heal skill grants might.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

1453.name: Pinnacle of Strength
1453.description: Might applied to you grants more power.

1454.name: Might Makes Right
1454.description: Gain health and endurance whenever you apply might to yourself.

2000.name: Body Blow
2000.description: Stuns, dazes, knockbacks, pulls, pushes, and launches inflict bleeding and weakness.

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

1348.name: Adrenal Health
1348.description: Gain health based on adrenaline spent.

facts.description: Regain health by spending adrenaline.

1350.name: Thick Skin
1350.description: Gain toughness while your health is above the threshold.

1367.name: Sundering Mace
1367.description: Stuns, dazes, and knock downs applied by mace skills last longer against vulnerable foes. Mace skills gain reduced recharge.

1368.name: Defy Pain
1368.description: Cast Lesser Endure Pain when struck while below the health threshold.

skills.name: Lesser Endure Pain

facts.description: You take no damage from incoming attacks. You are still susceptible to conditions and control effects.
You take no damage from incoming attacks. You are still susceptible to conditions and control effects.

skills.description: Stance. Take no damage from attacks. You are still susceptible to conditions and control effects.

traited_facts.description: You take no damage from incoming attacks. You are still susceptible to conditions and control effects.
You take no damage from incoming attacks. You are still susceptible to conditions and control effects.

1372.name: Cull the Weak
1372.description: Increases damage to weakened foes. Striking a foe below the health threshold inflicts weakness.

facts.description: Endurance regeneration decreased by 50%. 50% of hits are Glancing Blows (50% damage). Stacks duration.

1375.name: Last Stand
1375.description:
Cast Lesser Balanced Stance when you are disabled. Stances grant vigor when activated and have increased duration.
Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

facts.description: Endurance regeneration increased by 50%; stacks duration.

skills.name: Lesser Balanced Stance

facts.description: Periodically gain stability. Immune to critical hits.
Cannot be knocked down, pushed back, pulled, launched, stunned, dazed, floated, sunk, feared, or taunted.
Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.

skills.description: Stance. Gain stability and swiftness on an interval. Become immune to critical hits.

traited_facts.description: Periodically gain stability. Immune to critical hits.

1376.name: Shield Master
1376.description: Reflect missiles whenever you are blocking. Gain might when you block an attack. Shield skills gain reduced recharge.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

1379.name: Armored Attack
1379.description: Gain power based on your toughness.

1380.name: Spiked Armor
1380.description: Gain retaliation when you block or are struck by a critical hit. Retaliation gives you bonus toughness.

facts.description: Reflect incoming damage back to its source; stacks duration.

1488.name: Dogged March
1488.description: Reduce the duration of movement-impeding conditions and gain regeneration when you are affected by one of these conditions.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.
Unable to move; stacks duration.
Movement speed decreased by 50%; stacks duration.
Movement speed decreased by 66%; skill cooldown increased by 66%; stacks duration.

1649.name: Cleansing Ire
1649.description: Gain adrenaline when hit. Remove a condition for every bar of adrenaline spent when you hit with a <c=@abilitytype>burst</c> skill.

1708.name: Rousing Resilience
1708.description: Gain toughness and health when you break out of a stun.

facts.description: Gain up to 1,000 toughness based on your level.

1317.name: Heightened Focus
1317.description: Gain quickness when you strike a foe that is below the health threshold.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.

1329.name: Crack Shot
1329.description: Base rifle and harpoon gun shots gain bonus adrenaline. Rifle and harpoon gun skills gain reduced recharge.

1369.name: Axe Mastery
1369.description: Get ferocity while wielding an axe in either hand. Axe skills gain reduced recharge and grant adrenaline when you critically strike with one.

1381.name: Vengeful Return
1381.description: Vengeance has an increased chance to rally and gain more health and endurance when you rally.

1413.name: Warrior's Sprint
1413.description: Run faster while wielding melee weapons, and deal increased damage while you have swiftness. Movement skills break immobilization when used.

facts.description: Unable to move; stacks duration.

1417.name: Versatile Power
1417.description: Gain might on weapon swap. <c=@abilitytype>Burst</c> skills gain reduced recharge.

facts.description: Increased outgoing damage; stacks intensity.

1484.name: Inspiring Battle Standard
1484.description: <c=@abilitytype>Banners.</c> Banners also grant regeneration to allies. Unique banner buffs applied to you are stronger.

facts.description: Gain health every second; stacks duration.

1489.name: Destruction of the Empowered
1489.description: Deal increased damage per boon on your target.

1657.name: Burst Mastery
1657.description: <c=@abilitytype>Burst</c> skills deal more damage, grant swiftness, and restore a portion of adrenaline spent.

facts.description: Movement speed increased by 33%; stacks duration.

1709.name: Brawler's Recovery
1709.description: Remove conditions when you swap weapons.

1348.description: Gain health based on adrenaline spent.

facts.description: Regain health by spending adrenaline.

data.name: Mark of the Imperial Guard
data.description: <c=@flavor>Formerly worn by a member of the Imperial Guards of Cantha.</c>

upgrades.name: Superior Sigil of Earth
upgrades.description: Double-click to apply to a weapon.

buff.description:
60% Chance on Critical: Inflict Bleeding (5 Seconds)
(Cooldown: 2 Seconds)

data.name: Mithril Harvesting Sickle
data.description: Used to gather Asparagus, Cayenne Peppers, Leeks, Winter Root Vegetables, Verdant Herbs, Raspberries, Butternut Squash, Artichokes, and all other lesser edible plants.

data.name: Steel Logging Axe
data.description: Used to chop down Tukawa Saplings, Fir Saplings and all other lesser saplings.

data.name: Mithril Mining Pick
data.description: Used to mine Mithril, and all other lesser metals.

data.name: Mystic Salvage Kit
data.description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 25% chance of rarer materials. 80% chance of recovering upgrades from items.
